SELECT ic.comment_level AS commentLevel, ic.content AS content, ic.sepc_name AS sepcName, ic.created_time AS createdTime, u.nickname AS nickname, u.face as userFace FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id=u.id WHERE ic.item_id=#{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level=#{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, t.price_discount AS price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id=ii.item_id LEFT JOIN
(SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) t ON i.id=t.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts desc
t.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
